subtitle: What is BabyCenter?
description: We give expert advice about pregnancy and babies
title: What is BabyCenter?
content:
At **BabyCenter** you can get the best information about pregnancy and babies. 

Over 45 million parents all over the world use our advice.

We want all pregnant women and their families to be healthy. 

You can trust **BabyCenter** information. All our articles are written with experts. The experts want to help you and your baby stay healthy. 

We believe that by helping a mom, we also help her children, her family, and her community. 

Enjoy being a **BabyCenter** parent!

More information 

[www.babycentre.co.uk/][1] 

(You may need a data plan to access this site)


  [1]: http://www.babycentre.co.uk/
